participant_1.background:
I decided to sell some of my comic books to make some extra cash.
i am a fruitarian.
i am an angry person.
i like the band queens of the stone age.
I am a female in my early 20s.

participant_2.background:
I love having my dog around because he always makes me laugh.
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i have one older sister named mary.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.
I once got to see one of my favorite bands in concert.

content.text: Hello!  How is your day going?
Pretty good!  Just sold some of my comic books online.
Wow that's awesome!  I've always wanted to get into collecting comic books but I never have.
You should!  It's a lot of fun.  I'm a fan of the band Queens of the Stone Age, do you like them?
Yes!  I saw them in concert once.  They were amazing!  I'm not really into comic books but I love my dog, he always makes me laugh.
I'm not really a dog person but I can see the appeal.  What's your favorite animal?
I love cats!  They're so independent and cute.
Yeah they are!  I'm a solitary type too so I can relate to that.  Do you have any siblings?
I have one older sister named Mary.  She's my best friend.  I'm going to miss her a lot since she's moving away soon.
That's too bad!  I'm sure you'll stay in touch though.  I'm going to miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.
Yeah I'm sure we will.  It's hard to say goodbye to family.  I'm glad you got to see one of your favorite bands in concert!  That's awesome.
Yeah it was!  It was a great experience.  How are you feeling about the new year?
I'm excited for it!  I'm going to make some new goals and try to be more positive.  How about you?
I'm excited for it too!  I'm going to try to be more organized and productive.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll do great.  Have a good night!
